SELECT A.OPER_DT , A.REP_ROUT_ID , A.VHC_ID , A.ROUT_ID , A.ALLOC_NO , A.OPER_SN , A.NODE_ID , A.COR_ID , A.VHC_NO , A.DRV_ID , A.GPS_X , A.GPS_Y , A.TM_X , A.TM_Y , A.OPER_STS , A.BUS_STS , A.OBE_STS , A.SNSTVTY , A.DRV_ANGLE , A.CUR_SPD , A.ACLRTN_YN , A.DCLRTN_YN , A.CUR_STOP_TM , A.OPER_LEN , A.REP_ROUT_NM , A.NODE_SN , A.NODE_TYPE , A.ARRV_TM , A.DPRT_TM , A.LINK_ID , A.LINK_SN , A.LINK_SPD , A.GET_OFF_CNT , A.PSG_CNT , A.NEXT_NODE_ID , A.NEXT_NODE_ARRV_TM , A.DOOR_CD , A.DOOR_TM , B.REP_ROUT_NM , B.ROUT_NM , C.CHAS_NO , C.MAKER , D.DRV_NM , E.COMP_NM , A.PRV_PLCE_NM , F.NODE_TYPE
FROM BRT_CUR_OPER_INFO A LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST B ON A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_VHC_MST C ON A.VHC_ID = C.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_DRV_MST D ON A.DRV_ID = D.DRV_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST E ON C.COMP_ID = E.COMP_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST F ON A.NEXT_NODE_ID = F.NODE_TYPE
WHERE A.OPER_DT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y/%m/%d') AND B.DEL_YN != 'Y'
AND A.REP_ROUT_ID = #{CONTENT1}
AND A.ROUT_ID = #{CONTENT2}
AND A.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{CONTENT3}, '%')
ORDER BY A.REP_ROUT_ID, A.ROUT_ID, VHC_ID
SELECT A.REP_ROUT_ID ,B.REP_ROUT_NM FROM BRT_CUR_OPER_INFO A LEFT JOIN BMS_REP_ROUT_MST B ON A.REP_ROUT_ID = B.REP_ROUT_ID GROUP BY REP_ROUT_ID ORDER BY B.REP_ROUT_NM

SELECT A.ROUT_ID , A.NODE_ID , A.NODE_SN , A.NODE_NM , A.NODE_TYPE , A.LINK_ID , A.STTN_ID , A.STTN_NO , A.CRS_ID , A.ORGA_ID , A.GPS_X , A.GPS_Y , A.LINK_NODE_YN , B.MORN_STD , C.CRS_KIND , C.CRS_STS , C.PHASE_CNT , C.REMARK
FROM BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN A LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_LINK_CMPSTN B ON A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID AND A.LINK_ID = B.LINK_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_CRS_MST C ON A.NODE_ID = C.CRS_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST D ON A.ROUT_ID = D.ROUT_ID
WHERE A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT001' AND C.DEL_YN != 'Y'
AND D.REP_ROUT_ID = #{CONTENT1}
AND A.ROUT_ID = #{CONTENT2}
AND (A.NODE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT3},'%') || A.NODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT3},'%'))
ORDER BY NODE_SN

SELECT A.NODE_ID , A.MOCK_NODE_ID , A.NODE_NM , A.NODE_ENM , A.NODE_TYPE , A.GPS_X , A.GPS_Y , A.TM_X , A.TM_Y , A.ENTRY_RECOG_RADS , A.ADVNC_RECOG_RADS , A.USE_YN , A.UPD_DTM , A.UPD_ID , IF(D.CNT > 0 , 'CE001','CE002') COND_ERROR , E.ROUT_ID , E.NODE_SN
FROM BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN E LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_LINK_CMPSTN F ON E.ROUT_ID = F.ROUT_ID AND E.LINK_ID = F.LINK_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST A ON E.NODE_ID = A.NODE_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST G ON G.ROUT_ID = E.ROUT_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT B.NODE_ID, COUNT(B.NODE_ID) CNT FROM BMS_FCLT_INFO B LEFT JOIN BMS_FCLT_COND_INFO C ON B.MNG_ID = C.MNG_ID WHERE FCLT_COND = 'FC021' GROUP BY NODE_ID) D ON A.NODE_ID = D.NODE_ID
WHERE (A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT001' OR A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT002')
AND G.REP_ROUT_ID = #{CONTENT1}
AND E.ROUT_ID = #{CONTENT2}
AND (A.NODE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT3},'%') || A.NODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT3},'%'))
ORDER BY E.NODE_SN

SELECT MSG_ID , MSG_NM , MSG_CONTS
FROM BRT_OPER_INST_MSG_MST
